mods.accessCondition:
*License is for perpetual password protected institutional streaming* The educational license for this title for university/college use and allows for broad and unlimited academic use within your institution, and includes:
Classroom screening, student group screening, and library loan to students, faculty, and staff Public performance rights (PPR) for on-campus screenings, including those open to the general public, and university-affiliated off-campus screenings, provided they are free of charge ONE (1) PPR for an on- or off-campus screening open to the general public where admission is charged. Additional PPR are available for $75/event, with fee waivers offered for social justice programming or programming that prioritizes QTPOC access. Please contact us with questions. Digital file for password protected online screening from your institution's secure server This license does not expire and will never need to be renewed.
MAJOR! is closed captioned for Deaf and hard of hearing audiences, and features options for English, Spanish, and French subtitles.
This license is restricted to a single campus or location and may not be transferred or sold.
